sentences.english: Resilience is not simply an individual characteristic or a psychological phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 適應力不單單是個體特徵或者心理現象。

sentences.english: Mr Garriott, however, is not just a holiday-maker.
sentences.chinese: 遺憾的是，加雷特先生不單單是來度假的。

sentences.english: Just select multiple items of the same metaclass, such as several attributes.
sentences.chinese: 單單選擇同一元類的多項，例如一些屬性。

sentences.english: So, there is more useful purposes than that than just taking remainders.
sentences.chinese: 當然還有一些其他用途，不單單是取餘數。

sentences.english: To simply wake-up and experience this Shiva tattva is Shivratri.
sentences.chinese: 希瓦之夜就是單單的甦醒過來並體驗希瓦。

sentences.english: That alone should discourage most people from putting an obese frame on a bicycle seat.
sentences.chinese: 單單這一項就會讓那些超胖的人不去騎這種自行車了。

sentences.english: It's not merely a function of technique.
sentences.chinese: 這不單單是技術的一個功能。

sentences.english: This alone can make your image of the young 10-year-old.
sentences.chinese: 單單這一點就可以使你的形象年輕10歲。

sentences.english: The average price of a wedding dress alone was ?997.
sentences.chinese: 而單單一件婚紗的平均價格就高達997英鎊。

sentences.english: Gone, too, is any attempt to prove God by reason alone.
sentences.chinese: 也不會有人會單單依靠推論就來證明上帝。

sentences.english: You would not see her leave here all alone?
sentences.chinese: 你不會看她一個人孤單單地離去吧。

sentences.english: About 68, 000 cases of melanoma will be diagnosed in Americans this year alone.
sentences.chinese: 單單在今年，美國就有68000例黑素瘤被確診。

sentences.english: It can't just mean torture at the hands of the state.
sentences.chinese: 它並不單單指，國家所實行的酷刑。

sentences.english: In South Korea alone, there are some 1, 253 registered marriage agencies.
sentences.chinese: 單單在韓國就有約1253家註冊婚介所。

sentences.english: The mass media is not simply a window on the world.
sentences.chinese: 大衆傳媒不單單是世界之窗。

sentences.english: Not only is the number of ex-leaders growing.
sentences.chinese: 不單單是干預的往屆領導人的數量增加。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
